00030 #include "config.h"
00031 
00032 #include "iconsview.h"
00033  
00034 IconsView::IconsView(QString tmpDir, QWidget * parent, Qt::WFlags f) : QDialog(parent, f)
00035 {
00036     setupUi(this);
00037 
00038     
00039     tempDirectory=tmpDir;
00040     
00041     QDir tmp(tmpDir);
00042     tmp.setFilter(QDir::Files | QDir::Hidden | QDir::NoSymLinks);
00043     QFileInfoList list = tmp.entryInfoList();
00044         
00045     QListWidgetItem *iconItem;
00046     lstIcons->clear();
00047     lstIcons->setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00048     
00049     // Getting converted icons from temp directory
00050     for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00051         QFileInfo fileInfo = list.at(i);
00052         if (fileInfo.fileName().right(3)=="png"){
00053             iconItem = new QListWidgetItem(lstIcons, 0);
00054             iconItem->setText(fileInfo.fileName());
00055             iconItem->setIcon(QIcon(fileInfo.filePath()));
00056         }
00057     }
00058     
00059     connect(cmdCancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdCancel_Click()));
00060     connect(cmdOk, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(cmdOk_Click()));
00061     
00062     return;
00063 }
00064 
00065 void IconsView::cmdCancel_Click(){
00066     reject();
00067     return; 
00068 }
00069 
00070 void IconsView::cmdOk_Click(){
00071     //Getting selected icons
00072     
00073     //FIXME: For multiple icon export
00074     //QList<QListWidgetItem *> icoList = lstIcons->selectedItems();
00075         
00076     //for (int i=0; i<icoList.count(); i++){
00077     //      iconBuffer.names.append(icoList.at(i)->text());
00078     //  }
00079     
00080     if (lstIcons->currentItem()){
00081         QFile file;
00082     
00083         QString sourceFile, saveFile, saveFileName;
00084         bool ok=FALSE;
00085         
00086         sourceFile.clear();
00087         sourceFile.append(tempDirectory);
00088         sourceFile.append("/");
00089         sourceFile.append(lstIcons->currentItem()->text());
00090         
00091         
00092         if (cbDefaultExport->checkState()==Qt::Checked){
00093         saveFile.clear();
00094         saveFile.append(QDir::homePath());
00095         saveFile.append("/.config/");
00096         saveFile.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00097         saveFile.append("/icons/");
00098         saveFile.append(lstIcons->currentItem()->text());
00099         
00100         saveFileName=lstIcons->currentItem()->text();
00101         
00102         
00103         QMessageBox message;
00104             message.setText(tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists.<br>Replace existent or rename current?"));
00105             message.setWindowTitle(tr("Exporting icon"));
00106             message.setIcon(QMessageBox::Question);
00107             message.addButton(tr("Rename"),QMessageBox::ResetRole);
00108             message.addButton(tr("Use existing"), QMessageBox::ActionRole);
00109             message.addButton(tr("Replace"), QMessageBox::DestructiveRole);
00110             message.addButton(tr("Cancel"), QMessageBox::RejectRole);
00111                     
00112             while (QFile::exists (saveFile)){
00113                 switch (message.exec()){
00114                     case 0:
00115                         saveFileName = QInputDialog::getText(this, tr("Sorry. It seems file already exists."),
00116                                                                         tr("Replace existent or rename current?"), QLineEdit::Normal,
00117                                                                     saveFileName , &ok);
00118                         if ((!saveFileName.isEmpty()) && (ok)){
00119                             saveFile.clear();
00120                             saveFile.append(QDir::homePath());
00121                             saveFile.append("/.config/");
00122                             saveFile.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00123                             saveFile.append("/icons/");
00124                             saveFile.append(saveFileName);
00125                         } else {
00126                             reject();
00127                             return;
00128                         }
00129                     break;
00130                     case 1:
00131                         saveFile.clear();
00132                         saveFile.append(QDir::homePath());
00133                         saveFile.append("/.config/");
00134                         saveFile.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00135                         saveFile.append("/icons/");
00136                         saveFile.append(saveFileName);
00137                         selectedFile=saveFile;
00138                         accept();
00139                         return;
00140                     break;
00141                     case 2:
00142                         if (!file.remove(saveFile)){
00143                             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, i can't remove file: <br>%1.").arg(saveFile), QMessageBox::Ok);
00144                         }
00145                     break;
00146                     case 3:
00147                         reject();
00148                         return;
00149                     break;
00150                 }       
00151         }
00152         
00153         } else {
00154             saveFile.clear();
00155             saveFile.append(QDir::homePath());
00156             saveFile.append("/.config/");
00157             saveFile.append(APP_SHORT_NAME);
00158             saveFile.append("/icons/");
00159             saveFile = QFileDialog::getSaveFileName(this, tr("Select file to save"), saveFile , tr("Images (*.png)"));
00160     
00161             if (saveFile.isEmpty()){
00162                 reject();
00163                 return;
00164             }
00165         }
00166         
00167         if (!file.copy(sourceFile, saveFile)){
00168             QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Error"), tr("Sorry, i can't create file: <br>%1.").arg(saveFile), QMessageBox::Ok);
00169         }
00170         
00171         selectedFile=saveFile;
00172         accept();
00173         return;
00174         
00175     } else {
00176         reject();
00177         return;
00178     }
00179 }
